game_description: Walking past a Silkworm, do you ever find yourself wondering.. what would life be like if ~I~ were a Silkworm? Wonder no more! Silkworm is an open-world Action-Adventure game set in expansive Silky City. Jump, Swing, Climb, Zipline your way through the city, and fulfill your Silkworm destiny. Learn to make games like this with us :D - https://discord.gg/YHKCQP6REp (check website field below for clickable version) Or for a more casual look into the making of these games, follow on TikTok: danger_dom_
review_1: This game has the best swinging of any game I‚Äôve ever played and when you get good at this game the thrill of swinging through the city at top speeds doing tricks is extremely fun, I would recommend this game for anyone looking for a ‚Äúspider man‚Äù experience. Also PLEASE MAKE TEXTURES if you can do that this game would be perfect, also customization for your suit would be nice.
review_3: This game has ungodly potential, the swinging physics are amazing, and the layout of the map is good however, these are my only compliments. So i feel there need to be some improvements... -textures. just any kind of building textures, and street textures. -customization. at least let me change the color of my hands, if you want to add onto that, give some different hand textures and designs. although its not very important. -different jumping mechanics. the jumping we have now is buggy and doesnt work half the time. just let me push a button to jump. -make the webs travel faster. its annoying to just watch the webs travel for a couple seconds before hitting anything, if anything at all. speaking of which... -reticles. Just something to help us aim. -turning. something like some turning settings. snap turning is disorienting. -something to do. add some targets to aim at and shoot for points, or even drones to take down. something other than just swinging. Now id like to mention some things it would be cool to see, but its not important. -cars. when and if street textures are added. some cars driving in the streets would be pretty cool. -weather. weather changes, like rain, snow, stuff like that... - different web settings. when and if theres something for us to take down or fight, there should be different web settings that you can change with a button. like a web made to catch things, rapid fire, yknow add some variety. Now im no expert at games. However I know that this game has A LOT of potential and im just suggesting things that would fulfill even a bit of that potential. the game as it is now is... enjoyable. but get boring very quickly. If you have read this far, i appreciated you. have a good day!
review_5: I love the game but the last time I played a year ago it did not change at all would love to see better buildings
